sentences.sContent: Wherefore, my brethren, when ye come together to eat, tarry one for another.
sentences.sContent_eng: Wherefore, my brethren, when ye come together to eat, tarry one for another.
sentences.sCn: 所以我弟兄们，你们聚会吃的时候，要彼此等待。

sentences.sContent: Therefore, brethren, we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith.
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore, brethren, we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith.
sentences.sCn: 所以弟兄们， 我们在一切困苦患难之中， 因着你们的信心就得了安慰。

trans.tranOther: used to address or talk about the members of an organization or group, especially a religious group
